overview: Local teens of Denver, Colorado lead viewers through a guide to all things Denver, Colorado. Written by and starring the comedy troupe, Phantasmagoria LLC, “Denver Tourism Tapes” is a hilariously far-out grab bag of tropes, parodies, existential comedy, lo-fi psychedelia, kids playtime, and lighthearted commentary. Originally published as four individual episodes, we present it here as a feature length film, an anything goes extravaganza, deeply absurd and monumentally silly.
title: Denver Tourism Tapes
